l = TemplateLookup()
l.put_string('caller',
    """

            <%include file="callee" args="val1='3', val2='4'"/>

        """
    )
l.put_string('callee',
    """
            <%block name="foob">
                foob, ${pageargs['val1']}, ${pageargs['val2']}
            </%block>
        """
    )
self._do_test(l.get_template('caller'), ['foob, 3, 4'], filters=result_lines)
